Name: PhotoStage
About the game: PhotoStage is an easy-to-use slideshow software that allows you to create stunning slideshows from your digital pictures, photos, and video files. PhotoStage Features Include: Transitions & Effects Includes zoom, crop, fade, pan, Ken Burns effect and more to bring your photos to life Panning and zoom effects add extra dimension Fade transitions give your slideshow a professional touch Preview the effects in real time Customize the duration of the effect Complete Photo Optimization Crop, rotate and flip photos easily Add text captions to individual slides Fine tune brightness, color and saturation Amazing Audio Tools Add music tracks to your slideshow Record narrations with the click of a button Fade, loop, and add track effects to your audio Audio effects include amplify, echo, reverb, and more Save & Share Burn slideshows to DVD and watch on your TV Upload directly to YouTube, Vimeo or Flickr and share online Save to Android, iPhone, and other mobile devices Supports full HD (i.e. 720p, 1080p)
Meta Title: PhotoStage: Jun 9, 2020, NCH Software and Full Overview
